QuestData.Title: Return to Sage Palerunner
QuestData.Description: The soft glow from the pedestal brightens, and you can see a simple chain left behind. This must be the amulet Sage Palerunner sent you here for...
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Darkmist Amulet to Sage Palerunner.
QuestData.CompletionText: You've returned. What have you found?
QuestData.RewardText: I am a fool...I was misled. This is nothing more than a rusted trinket, and my visions have no doubt been fulfilled.$B$BForgive me, $n. But should you meet this demoness again, I pray you will triumph over her as you did Verinias.
